Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • kopper.tetris.shape.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShapeI, ShapeJ, ShapeL, ShapeO, ShapeS, ShapeT, ShapeZ

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    KopperKnight A class that defines the superclass for a Tetromino shape.
